titleStmt.title: Five love-letters from a nun to a cavalier done out of French into English.
Lettres portugaises. English
titleStmt.author: Guilleragues, Gabriel Joseph de Lavergne, vicomte de, 1628-1685.
Alcoforado, Mariana, 1640-1723.
Chamilly, Noël Bouton, marquis de, 1636-1715.
L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.

notesStmt.note: Long attributed to Mariana Alcoforado and supposedly written to Noël Bouton, Marquis de Chamilly, these letters are now attributed to Guilleragues.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
